cloud_connect_datacenter_add_dc_info: You can only have one configuration per AZ.
cloud_connect_datacenter_add_select_asn_: The OVHcloud AS number that will be configured on the OVHcloud Connect routers in the availability zone. This number may be different to the ASN chosen for the PoP.
